attr.title: Balatro
attr.desc: Balatro is a poker-inspired roguelike deck builder all about creating powerful synergies and winning big.
attr.inst: On macOS, grab this Balatro.love file (~/Library/Application Support/Steam/steamapps/common/Balatro/Balatro.app/Contents/Resources/Balatro.love) and put into the balatro folder. On Windows, simply copy Balatro.exe to the balatro folder
